headline: Arch Capital Group Ltd. Announces Special Cash Dividend of $1.9 Billion and Senior Executive Promotions
summary: PEMBROKE, Bermuda, November 07, 2024--Arch Capital Group Ltd. (NASDAQ: ACGL, "Arch" or "the Company") today announced that its Board of Directors (Board) has declared a special cash dividend (special dividend) of $1.9 billion to common shareholders, representing $5.00 per outstanding common share. The special dividend is payable on Dec. 4, 2024, to common shareholders of record on Nov. 18, 2024.
